attributes.action: stop all foreign aid and allocate this money to britains police forces
attributes.additional_details: money given to other countries is wasted and is used inappropriately ,particlularly finding its way  to the famillies of suicide bombers,as we are facing cutbacks in the police budget,this money should be kept in this country and used to build up britains police forces allowing more police on the streets with the latest equipment,this is taxpayers money and we should have a say in its distribution
